title: The Cunning Love
resume: Love can not be proven by a game, love is proven by sincerity. Her special talent is to charm men into falling in love with her. She is like a love tester, if you want to know if your boyfriend is sincere and won’t stray, you request her services. Mostly she does this for her friends. Full time, she is a flight attendant. When her boss learns of her talents, she is hired to seduce her boss’s son from his wayward girlfriend and bankrupt his pig farm in order for him to come work for the airline full time. She is given 3 million baht for the job.
